reviews.review_text: I received the 3 day version of the Dr. Dennis Gross Alpha Beta Extra Strength daily peel and I must say that three days is all I needed to see a truly noticeable Improvement. Not only were my pores much tighter, appearing smaller, but my skin was so soft and has a nice glow. It had a beautiful brightening effect on my skin. Because I received the extra strength I didn't want to overdo it so I only used it once a day every other day so it lasted me about a week. It did not aggravate my skin whatsoever. It does tingle a little and it does smell terrible, very medicinal, but the smell is literally the only negative I can think of. There was a visible improvement in my pores and texture, my skin looks smoother, feels more hydrated, and honestly it just looks much better. To see such a noticeable Improvement after just three uses I think is pretty miraculous. It's easy to apply, once a day just massage the step one pad on clean and dry skin until dry, wait 2 minutes and do the same with step number two. And that's. It's that simple! I found this stuff to honestly be quite a game-changer for my skin. I definitely recommend this stuff. There is a peel for everyone from an Ultra Gentle daily peel to the Extra Strength version so you really can't go wrong. So what are you waiting for??? Take the peel challenge! reviews.review_text: THIS. PRODUCT. IS. EVERYTHING! I was so excited to try this product as I am in my late 20s and have began to experience some signs of aging (specifically fine lines) and because the reviews were so positive. I bought this because I wanted an intense anti-aging treatment to potentially slow down the aging process and help my skin maintain a youthful and healthy appearance. This product is perfection. My skin has never looked or felt better. This product does it all. My face is soft, silky, smooth... it glows.. my fine lines have diminished. I feel like a new person after using this treatment. I have never used a peel like this before and I have combination skin, leaning dry - that being said, I realize this product is intended to be used daily, but I only use it once a week - and my results are still amazing! I do experience a slight tingling sensation while applying the first step of the product, but the tingling subsides after 30 seconds or so. I donu2019t experience any sort of u201csensationu201d when applying the second step; it just feels nice and gentle on my skin after the intense peel. The product doesnu2019t smell great - it smells kind of chemically - but itu2019s not overwhelming or irritating to me. I have so enjoyed this product and truly believe it is worth the price! I will continue to use this product as long as I can get my hands on it! Highly recommend!

This thing's got 7 acids in it and combats basically every skin issue, it's honestly an all-in-one miracle.   I tried it expecting the extra strength to be too intense, but it wasn't at all. Step 1 burned a little while it worked, but step 2 calms it down. The next day, one of my newly forming pimples was completely wiped out, like it never even existed! I still have one monster of a pimple in the third eye area, so FYI it wasn't an instant cure-absolutely-all, but I'm hoping a couple more days of this product kill the nasty thing.   Overall, I'm very impressed so far.

reviews.review_text: I was very skeptical about this new product. Ive seen so many different skin products claiming to do as it is suppose to do, but end up breaking you out more and drying skin so bad. I read directions which were clear and easy to follow. I took the towlette out the pack and began to apply to my face in circle motion until it was almost dry. Step 1 completed in less than 3mins. I immediately felt the oil being lifted from my face and a firming feeling began. I started with step 2. Completed within 3 to 4 minutes applying in a circled motion until dry. My skin feels clean and firm. Also is noticeably clean and firm looking. As i did this routine for a few more days i see my skin changing and becoming clearer, firmer. My lines around my lips are less noticable. So my review is this product does work. If you are searching for a almost instant then you need to try this product out. Also its cruelty free,veganfree, and no harsh add ins.

reviews.review_text: 30 year old acne prone girl here with lots of red marks from picking. I was using the prescription ACZONE from my derm which was helpful for a while keeping acne at bay, but then a couple months ago I had a huge flare up on my jawline/chin/neck durnig that time of month (i always break out more during that time, but this time it was AWFUL!).   So I got the DAILY universal peels first 30 day. Seemed to help some and I didnt have any bad reactions, but progress was not great after two weeks. So I upped it to extra strength.  Within the first use I was breaking out all over again. So I stopped and went back to my universal dailies. Skin started to clear up.   Then I tried to go back again to extra strength. BREAKING OUT AGAIN.  Sticking to the universal ones. Hopefully I'll see better difference otherwise I don't get the hype of this product.

reviews.review_text: I received a sample of the Dr. Dennis Gross Skincare Alpha Beta Extra Strength Daily Peel from PINCHme. I used the treatment one night while watching a movie, then waited two days before using the second treatment. I did not feel any sensation on my skin, but my skin is not particularly sensitive. Step 1 smelled very acidic, and almost made me wonder whether or not I should put it on the vulnerable skin of my face. I did, and boy am I glad! Step 2 did not have a noticeable smell and helped soothe the skin after Step 1. After two treatments, my skin had cleared up entirely. I saved the 3rd treatment for when I see another breakout starting later on. The only reason I docked a star is because the treatments are so expensive. If I hadn't received this as a sample, I would never have tried it. And I won't be able to afford it in the future, so I am unable to purchase it moving forward.

reviews.review_text: I received 3 of the alpha beta extra strength peel pads to try. I've never done a peel pad before, or any peels and did some research online before using them after seeing that these peels are very low strength. These were great on my skin and didn't cause any peeling like other peels do mainly since these are a at home peel. I have sensitive combo skin and after the first pad I used I saw immediate great results. It did give my skin a sunburned look right after but after using my kate somerville wrinkle warrior dermal quech spray with hyaluronic acid afterwards(use of HA after peels) helped plump my skin out and helped show off the results of the peel. My skin felt smoother so smooth and glowing. I ordered a 5 pack immediately after trying my samples and looking into doing stronger peel pads since these didn't seem to help with any breakouts but didn't make worse either. I recommend these for a deep exfoliation of the skin and anyone looking for help evening out your skin tone and lightening of dark pigment or spots on skin but with continued use of at least 7 or more probably.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great product but will I repurchase? No. Here's why:  When I purchased this, I was struggling with texture & maybe 2 or 3 breakouts but my skin was still mostly clear. I was hoping for a quick fix (hah yeah no). At the start, I used it every day to see how my skin would handle it at it's recommended usage and because I was so eager to see results. My skin got worse before it got better (even worse than what I started with) but I knew it was most likely because of purging, the retinol uglies (This was my first time using retinol) etc. so I continued. Around 2 weeks in, my skin started clearing up so I didn't feel the need to use the exfoliate step as much because I felt it was too stripping/unnecessary for daily use on my skin. So I switched to using the exfoliating step 2 days on 1 day off, but continued using the anti aging step on the day off (which I cut in half so it would even out).  I've now almost finished this product and although it didn't make a noticeable difference in my acne scarring it definitely helped clear my skin, made it more even, and made my pores less congested. Overall, I believe this is a great product to try out if your skin is really struggling (acne, texture or whatever it might be). It will help clear your skin and get it back on track. But if it's not that bad, I don't think it's worth it. Knowing what I know now, ill just be a bit more patient, and go back to using my salicylic cleanser, my lactic acid when my skin feels textured (The Ordinary's is awesome and it's only 7$) and purchase a high quality retinol instead. This way will be less harsh, cheaper and longer lasting. This is just my opinion and what I believe is best for my skin but hopefully it somewhat helps :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: What I love about Dr Dennis Gross Alpha Beta Extra Strength Daily Peel is it's simple to use. It's effective. I see results immediately. I have combination skin. I have uneven skin tone with rough patches here and there. Not dry skin, rough textured skin - particularly high on my cheekbones. I also have scars and smile lines. Step 1 has a floral tea scent and breaks down all those rough patches and imperfections. Step 2 is practically scentless; but, if I had to describe a scent, it smells like purified water. It smoothes my skin and evens my skin tone. It's a quick way to improve my appearance. It's a nice product for people like me who've always liked to do things myself as opposed to making an appointment with an esthetician or dermatologist.

reviews.review_text: Worked great! This peel left my face feeling amazing. I love how well portioned out they are. Itu2019s small but very strong. Iu2019ve only used it once and Iu2019ve seen results. Canu2019t wait to see what happens after a few uses.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I found this product interesting to use. I kept swirling the pad on my face but the pad never felt like it was drying out. I stopped after 2 minutes. I waited the 2 minutes and did the second pad and it wouldn't dry out either. I did notice my face really smooth after the first package. My face was not sticky afterward. I only used a serum without retinol and a moisturizer. Not sure how to make these work with other products in my routine.

reviews.review_text: I really didnu2019t see a difference in my face after the product was applied. But, what should I expect since I only had a three day supply. The product was supposed to peel off the dead skin but I didnu2019t see any shedding. The wipes did clean my skin because I saw the dirt on them when I was done.

reviews.review_title: Amazing product for uneven skin tone!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried Dr. Dennis Gross Extra Strength Alpha Beta Peel not having high expectations.  My big skin issues are discoloration, age spots, and uneven tone.  I've tried tons of products without much success, so I didn't have very high hopes that this would make more than a marginal difference if at all.  So I was beyond thrilled when I noticed after just a few uses that my skin was much brighter, my skin tone looked more even, and some stubborn spots have faded a bit.  Just be careful if you have very sensitive skin - this is strong but works wonders!  Loved it and will buy it again!

After a couple of uses I notice my pores were starting to get smaller and and my dark spots on my cheeks are starting to go away. I would definitely recommend this product !!
